item.title: Scaling the experience with the multi-brand Catalyst and Sitecore XM
item.description: Sitecore launches XM Cloud, Valtech Catalyst saves time, cost, boosts quality for multi-brand sites. Automates deployment, enhance brand experience swiftly, efficiently. Sitecore partnership with Valtech ensures customer's success and innovation.

item.title: Scaling the experience with the multi-brand Catalyst and Sitecore XM
item.description:
[en] Sitecore releases XM Cloud, Deploy sites faster, cost is low. Valtech Catalyst shines bright, Automates for brand sites right.
Multibrand firms find relief, Valtech Catalyst, a belief. Tech, content, design unite, Efficient, quick, take flight.
Automated rollouts soar, Sitecore powered, times no more. Efficiency is key, Valtech Catalyst, come see.
